description:
When scheduling conflicts occur, present a clear side-by-side view of conflicting events with options to reschedule, adjust duration, or proceed anyway. Show participant availability conflicts prominently.

**Rationale:** Users currently may not realize they're creating scheduling conflicts until after submission. Discovering conflicts post-creation forces tedious rework and can cause missed meetings or double-bookings.
title: Conflict Resolution Interface for Overlapping Events
